descriptionHtml: This make Drelas, the dark elf living in the whiterun hold, unaggressive towards the player and gives him more life. He now tends to his chickens and farm, visits his friend, Farengar Secret-Fire, and tends to his more.... necromantic needs.... At the nearby graveyard.   Be sure to track this mod for updates as there will be 2 or 3 updates later that make him a possible follower and maybe a merchant. My screenshot button wont work, so any submitted screenshots of Drelas from this mod will be welcomed.
author: kvatchcount
